AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Project Setup and Use
AD_WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: Setup of projects and project reporting
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP: Projects allow to monitor the status and progress of sales opportunities, service projects and investment projects. A Project is a process that is undertaken which can involve multiple steps or phases and require resources from more than one area.

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Language Setup
AD_WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: Setup a new Language of the system and translate elements
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP: Define a new language as a system language.

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Initial Client Setup Review
AD_WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: Review of system level setup of a new Client
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP: This workflow reviews the system setup of a new client as performed by the automatic Initial Client Setup.|You may want to check also the following Workflows:|- Accounting Setup|- Business Partner Setup|- Product Setup|- Price list Setup|- Warehouse Setup|- Tax Setup|

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Accounting Setup
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP: This workflow allows you to review and change your Accounting Rules.

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Business Partner Setup
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP: This workflow defines the Business Partners and the supporting rules.

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Product Setup
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP: Define your products manually. You should verify the settings especially if you import your products.

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Price List Setup
AD_WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: Define your Price Lists and Discounts
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP: You define your price lists after entering or importing your products

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Replication Setup
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP:
Data Replication allows you to synchronize data of remote instances with a central office. All actions are initialized from the central office.

|Central System:
|- setup system with all organizations, roles, etc.
|- run the migration to make sure that it is up-to-date
|- export the central system|

|Remote System:|- install the exact version as Central System
|- import data from Central System in the remote locations|

|Central System:|- Define Replication per Remote
|- Make sure that the ID range is unique per remote - otherwise you will loose transactions!
|- Initially Start the Replication Run to setup Remote|

|** Enter Transactions **|

|Central System:
|- Start the Replication Run when required|

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Tax Setup
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP: Setup the tax calculation for products, services and charges

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Sales Setup
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP: Setting up Sales Representatives, Commissions as well as Marketing Channels and Campaigns.

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Performance Measurement Setup
AD_WORKFLOW.HELP: This workflow guides you through setting up your performance measurement based on Key Performance Indicators, Balanced Scorecard, etc.||Most important: Do your analysis first!|- What are your goals and how do you measure it?||When you are setting up the system, you do it in reverse:|First you define how you measure it and last you define the goals for the measurements.|You have three ways measuring performance:|- via quantifiable measures (e.g. sales of $3 million in Q1)|- via manual measures|- via achievements (tasks)||The system converts the measures into percentages (based on the target and achieved measure - or number of total and reached achievements)

AD_WORKFLOW.NAME: Request Setup
AD_WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: Set up the client to process requests
